Package com.g1.mychess.admin.global

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.admin.global.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
GlobalExceptionHandler is responsible for handling exceptions across the application. It catches specific exceptions and returns the appropriate HTTP response with the relevant error message.

    • handleAdminNotFoundException

      @ExceptionHandler(AdminNotFoundException.class) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleAdminNotFoundException(AdminNotFoundException ex)
      Handles AdminNotFoundException and returns a 404 Not Found response.
      Parameters:
      ex - the AdminNotFoundException that was thrown
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error message and HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND
